title.description: A catchy YouTube video title under 60 characters

caption.description: A short, intriguing description, like a YouTube video caption without spoilers

resume.description: A summary of the full story, including spoilers

character.description: The name of the character that is speaking or narrating during the scene

script.description: The dialogue or narration for the scene

image_prompt.description: A detailed, descriptive prompt for an AI image generator that captures the visual essence of the scene

output.title: The Rise and Fall of Blockbuster: How Netflix Changed Entertainment Forever
output.caption: Join us as we explore the incredible journey of Blockbuster, from video rental giant to pop culture icon, and how Netflix revolutionized the entertainment industry forever.

scenes.script: In the late 20th century, there was a video store in almost every neighborhood. The biggest of them all was Blockbuster.
scenes.image_prompt: A vintage image of people lining up outside a Blockbuster store

scenes.script: I remember when Blockbuster first opened in our town. It was like a movie theater for video tapes!
scenes.image_prompt: A young Lucy with her friends in front of the new Blockbuster store

scenes.script: At its peak, Blockbuster had over 9,000 stores worldwide and a market value of $5 billion.
scenes.image_prompt: A map with thousands of red pins marking the locations of Blockbuster stores

scenes.script: As an employee, I saw firsthand how Blockbuster shaped pop culture. People would come in looking for specific movies they'd heard about from friends or seen on TV.
scenes.image_prompt: David standing behind the counter of a bustling Blockbuster store

scenes.script: But change was on the horizon. A new player entered the scene, promising movies without the trip to the store - Netflix.
scenes.image_prompt: The iconic Netflix red envelope and logo

scenes.script: When we got our first DVD from Netflix in the mail, it felt like magic. No more late fees or lines at Blockbuster!
scenes.image_prompt: Lucy opening a Netflix DVD envelope at home

scenes.script: I saw the writing on the wall when people started asking us if we had 'that newfangled Netflix' instead of specific movies.
scenes.image_prompt: David looking concerned behind the counter as customers ask about Netflix

scenes.script: By 2010, Blockbuster had filed for bankruptcy. The once-mighty video store was no more.
scenes.image_prompt: A 'closed' sign on the door of an abandoned Blockbuster store

scenes.script: We'd go back to visit old Blockbusters that had become antique stores or gyms. It was like visiting ghosts of movies past.
scenes.image_prompt: Lucy walking through a former Blockbuster now converted into another business

scenes.script: But even as Blockbuster faded away, its legacy lived on. Streaming services like Netflix brought us closer to entertainment than ever before.
scenes.image_prompt: A modern living room with a smart TV streaming movies from Netflix
